description.value:
Trigger A creature in the area finishes an action

Effect The trap launches a targeted ad enticing viewers to spend credits on a product or service. All creatures within 30 feet who can see, hear, or sense the ad must attempt a @Check[will|dc:17] save. The trap rolls initiative.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Dazzled].

Failure The target is dazzled and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fascinated] for 1 round and can't take any actions except to access the nearest computer or comm unit and make purchases as directed by the ad.

stealth.details: (trained), or DC 20 (expert) to notice the holoprojector, or detect magic

details.description: Colorful, lifelike figures flit in and out of a holographic advertisement in a barrage of pleasant sounds and sensations, enticing passersby to spend their credits. The hologram's source is a nearby projector.
details.disable: @Check[computers|dc:17] (trained) to deactivate the ad, or @Check[crafting|dc:20] (trained) or Thievery (trained) to disable the projector
details.reset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 minute.
details.routine: (1 action) The hazard plays a new ad each round, forcing all creatures that can sense it to attempt a new save.
